Package eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork

Class Edge

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.CrossModuleComponent
      • eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Edge
  • public final class Edge
extends CrossModuleComponent
    This class implements an edge of the Social Graph. An edge, in a context, can link the ego of the Contextual Ego Network to one of the alters. Edges comprise multiple interactions.

    • Method Detail

      • getSrc

        public Node getSrc()
        Returns:
        The source node of the edge

      • getDst

        public Node getDst()
        Returns:
        The destination node of the edge

      • getEgo

        public Node getEgo()
        Returns:
        The ego node of the edge context's ego network if it's a member of the edge, null otherwise

      • getAlter

        public Node getAlter()
        Returns:
        The edge endpoint that is not the ego of the edge context's ego network
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if the edge doesn't contain the contextual ego network's ego

      • getContext

        public Context getContext()
        Returns:
        The context the edge belongs to

      • getCreationTime

        public long getCreationTime()
        Returns:
        The creation timestamp of the edge

      • addDetectedInteraction

        public Interaction addDetectedInteraction​(java.lang.Object data)
        Adds a new interaction with no duration on this edge at the current timestamp
        Parameters:
        data - The data to be stored in the interaction
        Returns:
        the created interaction

      • addInteraction

        public Interaction addInteraction​(long timestamp,
                                  int duration,
                                  java.lang.Object data)
        Creates and adds a new interaction on this edge
        Parameters:
        timestamp - The start timestamp of the interaction
        duration - The duration of the interaction
        data - The data stored in the interaction
        Returns:
        the created interaction

      • getTieStrength

        public double getTieStrength()
        Returns:
        The weight of the edge. i.e. the tie strength between the source and the destination (the number of interactions that have taken place on this edge divided by the life span of the edge)

      • getInteractions

        public java.util.ArrayList<Interaction> getInteractions()
        Returns:
        A shallow copy of the edge's interaction list
